function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High population density in cities","Impact":"Facilitates the rapid spread of contagious diseases such as COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implement strict and enforceable measures for social distancing, mask-wearing, and crowd control","Technologies":"Smart city technology for crowd monitoring and management","People":"Residents of densely populated cities","Owner":"Local government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Difficulty in complying with social distancing and capacity limitations","Impact":"Increases the risk of disease transmission and makes containment measures less effective","Mitigation":"Utilize technology for crowd monitoring, establish strict guidelines for capacity limits, and enforce penalties for non-compliance","Technologies":"Smart sensors for crowd density monitoring, AI-based crowd management systems","People":"Residents, visitors, and workers in densely populated areas","Owner":"Local government and businesses"},{"Description":"Increased gatherings in leisure areas and markets","Impact":"Creates hotspots for disease transmission and challenges control efforts","Mitigation":"Implement strict regulations for crowd size, utilize advanced monitoring systems, and public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Smart surveillance cameras, IoT sensors for crowd counting, location-based crowd tracking apps","People":"Visitors to leisure areas and markets","Owner":"Local government and market authorities"}]}
